trans-unit.source: Contains information about the changes that occur in the <see cref="E:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.TextBoxBase.TextChanged" /> event.
trans-unit.target: 包含有关在 <see cref="E:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.TextBoxBase.TextChanged" /> 事件中发生的更改的信息。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextChange> object specifies where a change occurred in a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextBox> or <xref:System.Windows.Controls.RichTextBox>.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextChange>对象指定在发生更改<xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextBox>或<xref:System.Windows.Controls.RichTextBox>。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextChange.Offset%2A> property specifies the position of the change, the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextChange.AddedLength%2A> property specifies how many symbols were added, and the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextChange.RemovedLength%2A> property specifies how many symbols were removed.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextChange.Offset%2A>属性指定的位置的更改，<xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextChange.AddedLength%2A>属性指定已添加多少个符号，和<xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextChange.RemovedLength%2A>属性指定已删除多少个符号。

trans-unit.source: When the change occurs in a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextBox>, a symbol is a single character.
trans-unit.target: 当更改发生在<xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextBox>，符号是单个字符。

trans-unit.source: When a change occurs in a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.RichTextBox>, a symbol is one of the following:
trans-unit.target: 当更改发生在<xref:System.Windows.Controls.RichTextBox>，符号是由以下项之一：

trans-unit.source: An opening or closing tag for a <xref:System.Windows.Documents.TextElement> element.
trans-unit.target: 一个开始标记或结束标记<xref:System.Windows.Documents.TextElement>元素。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Windows.UIElement> element contained within an <xref:System.Windows.Documents.InlineUIContainer> or <xref:System.Windows.Documents.BlockUIContainer>.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.Windows.UIElement>中包含的元素<xref:System.Windows.Documents.InlineUIContainer>或<xref:System.Windows.Documents.BlockUIContainer>。

trans-unit.source: Note that such a <xref:System.Windows.UIElement> is always counted as exactly one symbol; any additional content or elements contained by the <xref:System.Windows.UIElement> are not counted as symbols.
trans-unit.target: 请注意，此类<xref:System.Windows.UIElement>始终算做一个符号; 任何其他内容或包含的元素<xref:System.Windows.UIElement>不被视为符号。

trans-unit.source: Each 16-bit [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_unicode](~/includes/tlasharptla-unicode-md.md)] character inside of a text <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Run> element.
trans-unit.target: 每个 16 位[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_unicode](~/includes/tlasharptla-unicode-md.md)]字符文本内<xref:System.Windows.Documents.Run>元素。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextChange> is introduced in the .NET Framework version 3.5.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextChange> 是.NET Framework 3.5 版中引入的。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Versions and Dependencies](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参见[版本和依赖关系](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md)。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the number of symbols that have been added to the control.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置已添加到控件的符号数。

trans-unit.source: The number of symbols that have been added to the control.
trans-unit.target: 已添加到控件的符号数。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextChange> is introduced in the .NET Framework version 3.5.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextChange> 是.NET Framework 3.5 版中引入的。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Versions and Dependencies](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参见[版本和依赖关系](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md)。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the position at which the change occurred.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置发生更改的位置。

trans-unit.source: The position at which the change occurred.
trans-unit.target: 发生更改的位置。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextChange> is introduced in the .NET Framework version 3.5.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextChange> 是.NET Framework 3.5 版中引入的。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Versions and Dependencies](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参见[版本和依赖关系](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md)。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the number of symbols that have been removed from the control.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置从控件中移除的符号数。

trans-unit.source: The number of symbols that have been removed from the control.
trans-unit.target: 从控件中移除的符号数。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextChange> is introduced in the .NET Framework version 3.5.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextChange> 是.NET Framework 3.5 版中引入的。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Versions and Dependencies](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参见[版本和依赖关系](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md)。
